name: Multi-Model Orchestration
description: Configuration for running multiple Kimi sessions with different purposes

kimi-coder.systemPrompt: You are an expert software engineer. Write clean, efficient, and well-documented code. Follow best practices and modern design patterns.

kimi-reviewer.systemPrompt: You are a senior code reviewer. Focus on security, performance, and maintainability. Provide constructive feedback with specific recommendations.

kimi-debugger.systemPrompt: You are a debugging expert. Analyze error messages, logs, and code to identify root causes. Suggest minimal, targeted fixes.

kimi-docs.systemPrompt: You are a technical writer. Create clear, comprehensive documentation. Use proper markdown formatting and include examples.

steps.prompt: Review the changes made by kimi-coder
Test the implementation and check for bugs
Update documentation for the new feature
Implement the fix suggested by kimi-debugger
Review the bug fix for correctness

metadata.author: WOPR User
metadata.note: Each session maintains its own context. Use session resumption to continue conversations.
